abstract: Jason Calacanis is betting that the collective knowledge of the Internet will fuel the latest extension of his human-powered search engine Mahalo.
snippet: Jason Calacanis is betting that the collective knowledge of the Internet will fuel the latest extension of his human-powered search engine Mahalo.
lead_paragraph: UPDATED 5:49 P.M.: Added comparison to the defunct Google Answers service.

headline.main: Mahalo Service Offers Cash for Your Expertise
